results.title: Gold Miners' Shining Moment - StocksToTrade
results.snippet: New Gold Inc. (NGD) outpaced its peers in the Basic Materials sector, showcasing a return of 129.4%, far above the sector's average. The company's success story shines a spotlight on its strategic abilities in a turbulent market. NGD's stock has hit a new 52-week high, surging 35.8% in just one month.

results.title: New Gold (NGD): A Zacks-Backed Growth Story with Undervalued Potential
results.snippet: (NGD) stands out as a compelling investment opportunity, driven by its Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) upgrade and surging earnings estimates. With a projected 125% jump in FY2025 EPS and a valuation well below peers, the company's fundamentals suggest it's primed for continued outperformance. However, investors must weigh its growth prospects against risks tied to commodity prices and leverage.
